notes.text:
This update fixes the following security issue:
      - CVE-2014-9273: Possible DOS because of missing size checks (bnc#908614)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: lib/handle.c in Hivex before 1.3.11 allows local users to execute arbitrary code and gain privileges via a small hive files, which triggers an out-of-bounds read or write.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
